channel.title: Umm idk if this is an ok design lol wtf
channel.description:
OK THIS IS A IMAGE FOR ALL YOU DUMB MORONS WHO ARE ABOUT TO POST BOUT NO BUTTONS WORKING!!!
http://jarod-billingslea.freehostia.com/site/JB-redesigned/index.php
Caps on purpose, I did it for the lulz/moron/dummies.
OK, anyways. I did a redesign tonight right before im going to sleep. Idk if this is a good design or wut, so tomorrow I will do another, eh? :D So... I hope you guys can give me ideas, please. Im on shortage atm, you know im retarded :).

item.title: Umm idk if this is an ok design lol wtf
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

if i were you id look at other sites, yours dosent seem appealing to me. the way i look at is, your website, especially if its your portfolio and even more if you plan to do business from it selling freelance web work needs to be your best work you have done. If i were to visit your site interested at hiring you to make a site for me the 1st thing you see is your own website and personally if i see your website isn’t that appealing i don’t need to look at your portfolio to determine your not right for the job.

sites these days are based around art and vector images. the more unusual your site is the more it will grip your viewers things like standard menu bars ect are considered boring these days if you were to make a unusual menu based around some sort of art it becomes more interesting… take this site from the list below its menu is different http://www.loodo.com.br/ lots of little things like this is what make sites appealing keep things like this in mind.

take a look at this list there’s a few nice sites there http://net.tutsplus.com/articles/web-roundups/30-exceptional-web-designs-for-the-web/

if i were you id keep a eye on http://net.tutsplus.com its a great site to get some inspiration from.

Read full topic
